# Data preparation

## Retrieving data from NCBI GEO

ExpressionAnalysis requires several input files, which should be organized in specific formats. Here, we present an example of the data processing steps using a public NCBI GEO dataset: SRP199678. The R code [recount3.example.R](https://github.com/interactivereport/RNASequest/blob/main/example/recount3.example.R){target="_blank"} can be run in the terminal under the conda environment created before.

```
conda activate ExpressionAnalysis
cd RNASequest/example

Rscript recount3.example.R
```

## File hierarchy

After running recount3.example.R, we will have all input files for ExpressionAnalysis with the following hierarchy:

```
SRP199678/
    ├── comparison.csv
    ├── counts.tsv
    ├── geneAnnotation.csv
    ├── geneLength.tsv
    ├── meta.csv
    └── project.yml
```
